text: int maxsum = 0 ; void calcsum ( int * * arr , int sum , int row , int col , int rows ) { if ( row < rows ) { sum = sum + arr [ row ] [ col ] ; if ( sum > maxsum ) { maxsum = sum ; } calcsum ( arr , sum , row + 1 , col , rows ) ; calcsum ( arr , sum , row + 1 , col + 1 , rows ) ; } } int main ( ) { int n , rows , i = 1 , j ; int * arr [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & rows ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= rows ; i ++ ) { arr [ i - 1 ] = malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * i ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) ; } } maxsum = 0 ; calcsum ( arr , 0 , 0 , 0 , rows ) ; printf ( "%d" , maxsum ) ; } return 0 ; }
